Package Server

Class OblServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • Server.OblServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class OblServer
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    This class overrides some of the methods in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the server.
